title: Roasted Raspberry Chipotle Mustard Cream Sauce

Ingredients.1: 0.25 cup roasted raspberry chipotle sauce (such as Fischer & Wieser® Original Roasted Raspberry Chipotle Sauce)

Ingredients.3: 1 (5.2 ounce) package garlic and herb cheese spread (such as Boursin®)

Ingredients.5: 0.25 teaspoon ground chipotle pepper, or to taste

Directions.1: Combine chipotle sauce, mustard, cheese, sour cream, and pepper in a small bowl; mix well. Serve at room temperature or chilled.
